description: Alex found out that his boyfriend cheated on him. And it wasn't just one time. This dude was all over town. He was banging tricks behind dumpsters, he was sucking dick in porn shops, he was cruising like it was his job. Talk about a slutty boy, but, his boyfriend found out and decided to make his own porn. A porn featuring him and Johnny. His, now, ex always wanted Johnny, so he knew it would destroy him to see them together. Watch horny teen boys get revenge and dick.
title: Penis Pumper
